root.name: BlindSide
root.description: GameplayBlindSide uses custom audio algorithms to turn any pair of stereo headphones into simulated surround sound. Using only your ears, youâ€™ll to learn how to explore the darkness and make your way through the fully physical world surrounding you. There are monsters roaming the dark, and you must find a way to stay alive while trying to unravel the mystery of why you can no longer see.
